name: AzureRM Network Interface
description: This module creates 'n' network interfaces for the Azure cloud

variables.name: resourceGroupName
variables.description: The name of the resource group containing the NIC

variables.name: location
variables.description: The geographical location of the NIC

variables.name: count
variables.description: The number of NIC instances to create

variables.name: subnetID
variables.description: The ID of the subnet to put the NIC in

variables.name: publicIPAddressID
variables.description: The ID of a public IP-Address associated with the NIC. Leave blank for none

outputs.name: idSplat
outputs.description: String of IDs separated by commas
